synopsis.text: It follows the journey of Kanna, a young priestess with mystical winged lineage, as she escapes her confined life in the temple to find her estranged mother. Joined by her devoted guard Ryuya, who she secretly loves, and her trusted servant Uruha, the trio embarks on a thrilling adventure filled with narrow escapes from pursuers. As they navigate the world outside the temple walls, they share moments of tranquility that provide a brief respite from the impending danger. With a legendary curse looming over Kanna, the journey to reunite with her mother becomes a desperate race against time. Will Kanna be able to elude her tragic fate and finally embrace her mother after all these years? This anime delves deeper into the Summer Arc of the Air TV series, revealing more of the trio's adventures along the way.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
